content: भिक्षुः [भिक्ष्-उन्] {@--1@} A beggar, mendicant in general; भिक्षां च भिक्षवे दद्यात् <ls>Ms. 3. 94.</ls> {@--2@} A religious mendicant, a Brāhmaṇa in the fourth order of his religious life (when he quits his house and family and lives only on alms), a {%Saṃnyāsin%}. {@--3@} The fourth order or stage in the religious life of a Brāhmaṇa (संन्यास). {@--4@} A Buddhist mendicant.
